name: CWD 3D Image Gallery
author: Coral Web Design

sections.description:
CWD 3D Image gallery is a professionally developed and free WordPress plugin that allows you to create a image gallery with a 3d view that takes advantage of css3.

Based on : http://tympanus.net/codrops/2011/09/05/slicebox-3d-image-slider

Choose where to add CWD 3D Image Gallery:

  • With a shortcode

You can add multiple image gallery in one page

Supported Browsers:

  • Browser that supports CSS3


Many users love attractive images

CWD 3D Image Gallery Plugin is maintained by Coral Web Designs, a technology company offering
high quality products on affordable cost on agreed time
sections.installation:
Plugin Installation

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory of your WordPress site,
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress,
  3. Visit the “CWD 3D Image Gallery” administration page to setup the plugin.
sections.faq:
Does CWD 3D Image Gallery can be embedded through a shortcode?

Yes. Shorcode references are shown in plugin dashboard for your convenience

Do not hesitate to contact us at www.coralwebdesigns.com if you need further assistance.

Images does not shown in given pixels

If you encounter any problems with 3D Image Gallery , please use regenerate thumbnails option under settings of the gallery.

Do I have to option to customize my gallery?

Yes, you can customize the gallery under gallery settings.

Where can I report bugs, leave my feedback and get support?

Our team answers your questions at:
http://www.coralwebdesigns.com/#contact

The plugin documentation is available at:
http://www.coralwebdesigns.com/blog/cwd-3d-image-gallery-wordpress-plugin/
